member.name: IMFRemoteDesktopPlugin.UpdateTopology
member.summary: Modifies a topology for use in a Terminal Services environment.
member.param: Pointer to the interface of the topology.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

member.name: IMFRemoteDesktopPlugin
member.summary: Modifies a topology for use in a Terminal Services environment.
